questions_and_answers.question: hi
questions_and_answers.answer: It appears you have not asked a specific question regarding the National Parivar Mediclaim Plus Policy. Please provide a specific query so I can assist you accordingly. If you are inquiring about the process for grievance redressal, the insured person may submit a written complaint to the Policy Issuing Office or Grievance cell at the Regional Office of the Company, or contact the Customer Relationship Management Dept., or approach the Insurance Ombudsman of the respective area/region as listed in Annexure-III (Page 22-23 of the policy document).
